highlights.title: Juara 1 Lomba Debat Nasional Tingkat Mahasiswa
highlights.description: Tim UNAIC berhasil meraih juara 1 dalam lomba debat tingkat nasional.
highlights.titleEn: 1st Place Winner in the National University-Level Debate Competition
highlights.descriptionEn: The UNAIC team won first place in the national debate competition.

highlights.title: Penghargaan Dosen Berprestasi
highlights.description: Dosen UNAIC mendapatkan penghargaan dosen berprestasi tingkat provinsi.
highlights.descriptionEn: UNAIC lecturers received provincial-level awards for outstanding lecturers.

highlights.title: Juara 2 Lomba Karya Tulis Ilmiah
highlights.description: Mahasiswa UNAIC meraih juara 2 dalam lomba karya tulis ilmiah tingkat nasional.
highlights.titleEn: Second Place in Scientific Writing Competition
highlights.descriptionEn: UNAIC students won second place in a national scientific writing competition.

carousel.title: Juara 1 Kompetisi Robotik Internasional
carousel.titleEn: 1st Place Winner in the International Robotics Competition

carousel.title: Juara 3 Olimpiade Matematika Internasional
carousel.titleEn: Third Place in the International Mathematics Olympiad

timeline.description: Juara lomba karya tulis ilmiah nasional
